reviews.title: Solid COD Experience
reviews.content: Modern Warfare III delivers the expected Call of Duty experience. The campaign is short but action-packed, multiplayer is smooth, and the new Zombies mode is a welcome addition. Good but not revolutionary.

reviews.title: More of the Same
reviews.content: The game feels like an expansion pack rather than a full sequel. The campaign is underwhelming, and multiplayer maps are mostly remakes. Still fun to play, but lacks innovation.

reviews.title: Great Multiplayer
reviews.content: The multiplayer is where this game shines. The gunplay is excellent, maps are well-designed, and the progression system is satisfying. Campaign could be better, but multiplayer keeps me coming back.

reviews.title: Zombies Mode is Fun
reviews.content: The new Zombies mode is a great addition. It combines the best of traditional Zombies with Warzone elements. The campaign is forgettable, but Zombies and multiplayer make this worth playing.

reviews.title: Disappointing Campaign
reviews.content: The campaign is the shortest and weakest in recent memory. Multiplayer is solid but feels recycled. At full price, this feels like a DLC rather than a full game. Wait for a sale.
